data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
It is impossible for you to go backwards in all directions. Reversing backwards is impossible when facing forward. There is only one way forward. Correct answer: Yes.
If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Take 4 steps. Turn around. Take 4 steps. Turn around. Turn right. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
You must turn right after taking 4 steps to go back to your starting point. So, the answer is No.
If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Take 6 steps. Take 4 steps. Turn around. Take 10 steps. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
Since 6 steps is shorter than 4 steps, the one can return to 6 steps from the starting point. So, the answer is Yes.
If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Take 7 steps. Take 1 step. Take 7 steps. Turn left. Take 5 steps. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
Take 1 step to step 2 - 7. Take 7 steps to step 3. Take 5 steps to turn left. So, the answer is No.

If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Take 10 steps. Turn left. Turn left. Take 9 steps. Take 3 steps. Take 3 steps. Turn around. Take 5 steps. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
You can return to the starting point with just 10 steps. It involves turning right twice. So, the answer is Yes.

Turn left when you change directions to turn right and you must do it 3 times in order to return back to the starting point. So, the answer is yes.
If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Take 8 steps. Take 9 steps. Turn right. Turn right. Take 8 steps. Take 9 steps. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
Taking 9 steps leads us to take 8 steps. Turning right leads us to take 9 steps. So, the answer is No.
If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Take 6 steps. Turn around. Take 8 steps. Take 2 steps. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
No, you cannot take 8 steps to step backward or forward. You can only take 2 steps to step backwards. So, the answer is No.

If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 1 step left. Take 4 steps forward. Take 6 steps forward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If you face forward, you are always forward facing. If you face right, you are opposite to the right. If you take one step left in the direction you're facing, you will also take 1 step left in this direction. If you take 4 steps forward in the direction you're facing, you will also take 4 steps forward in this direction. If you take 6 steps forward in the direction you're facing, you will take 6 steps forward in this direction. So, the answer is yes.

If you take a full 10 steps to get back to the starting point, you'll have to take another 9 steps to get back. So, the answer is Yes.

Take 2 steps backward and one backward. This is how you get back to your starting point. So, the answer is Yes.

You take 8 steps right and return to the starting point from there. Taking 2 steps left is what you do in the first set of directions. So, the answer is Yes.

Each of the steps backwards in the order of arrival to the starting point is a set of three steps. The first set of 3 steps left is to be taken back to the starting point from where you started. So, the answer is No.

Your head should always.. Your legs should always.. Your feet should always.. Your body should always face forward. And your body should always face forward. So, the answer is No.
